title: Chloe Smith – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Chloe Smith, the Conservative MP for Norwich North, on Twitter on 23 October 2022.
content:
I spoke to Rishi Sunak about his hopes for our country, and I’ve been listening to my local members.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

I intend to back Rishi to be Prime Minister, acting in the national interest and achieving the stability and opportunity that our nation needs.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
